bike.description: 7005 aluminum double-butted main frame, hydroformed top tube for comfortable portage, 1 1/8-1.5" tapered headtube, carbon fiber seat stays, 34.9mm seat tube, replaceable derailleur hanger, single eyelet

components.description: Jamis Cross, full carbon composite with monocoque construction, 1 1/8-1.5" tapered steerer, integrated, CNCJAMIS_SINGLEQUOTEd cable stop
Alex ALX-190 wheelset with CNC sidewalls, 24/28H, aero rim profile, machined ball-bearing hubs and DT stainless steel spokes
SRAM APEX mid-cage rear and SRAM APEX braze on front with 34.9mm alloy clamp
SRAM APEX DoubleTap with Zero-Loss shift technology, 20-Speed
FSA Vero cross compact double with PowerDrive, 46/36T, 170mm (48/51) 172.5mm (54/56) 175mm (58/61)
Ritchey Comp Logic II, 6061 double-butted aluminum, 31.8 x 400mm (48/51), 420mm (54/56), 440mm (58/61)
Ritchey Comp 4-Axis, 3D net forged 6061 alloy, 6JAMIS_DEGREE x 90mm (48/51), 100mm (54/56), 120mm (58/61)
Ritchey Road, 31.6 x 300mm with Jamis 7075-AL CNC aluminum integrated cable hanger/adjuster 1-bolt seat post clamp
Selle San Marco Ponza Power Arrowhead with Microfeel+High Frequency cover and carbon steel rails
